       <li id="cite_note-Accuser-172">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         ^
         <a href="#cite_ref-Accuser_172-0">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>

           </i>

          </sup>
         </a>

        <span class="reference-text">

            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">

       <li id="cite_note-Help-351">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-Help_351-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <span class="citation web">
          Heyliger, M.
          <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20081204150926/http://music.consumerhelpweb.com/artists/jackson/thriller.htm" rel="nofollow">
           "A State-of-the-Art Pop Album: Thriller by Michael"
          </a>
          . Consumerhelpweb.com. Archived from
          <a class="external text" href="http://music.consumerhelpweb.com/artists/jackson/thriller.htm" rel="nofollow">
           the original
          </a>
          on December 4, 2008.
          <q>
           Not many artists could pull off such a variety of styles (funk, post-disco, rock, easy listening, ballads)...
          </q>
         </span>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson&amp;rft.aufirst=M.&amp;rft.au=Heyliger%2C+M.&amp;rft.aulast=Heyliger&amp;rft.btitle=A+State-of-the-Art+Pop+Album%3A+Thriller+by+Michael&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fmusic.consumerhelpweb.com%2Fartists%2Fjackson%2Fthriller.htm&amp;rft.pub=Consumerhelpweb.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-352">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-352">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <span class="citation journal">

          </a>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson&amp;rft.atitle=Michael+Jackson+Turns+30%21&amp;rft.date=August+29%2C+1988&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%3Fid%3DL70DAAAAMBAJ%26pg%3DPA58&amp;rft.issn=0021-5996&amp;rft.issue=35&amp;rft.jtitle=Jet&amp;rft.pages=58&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.volume=74">

       <li id="cite_note-AMThriller-353">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         ^
         <a href="#cite_ref-AMThriller_353-0">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             a
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
         <a href="#cite_ref-AMThriller_353-1">

         </span>

        <span class="reference-text">
         <span class="citation news">
          Bain, Raymone K. (October 31, 2006).
          <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070217114004/http://www.mjtmc.com/news/details.aspx?lang=EN&amp;module=AHAA&amp;baseModule=AHAA&amp;news_id=1062&amp;page=1" rel="nofollow">
           "Statement from Raymone Bain to all fans and fanclubs"
          </a>
          . Mjtmc.com. Archived from
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.mjtmc.com/news/details.aspx?lang=EN&amp;module=AHAA&amp;baseModule=AHAA&amp;news_id=1062&amp;page=1" rel="nofollow">
           the original
          </a>
          on February 7, 2007.
         </span>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson&amp;rft.au=Bain%2C+Raymone+K.&amp;rft.aufirst=Raymone+K.&amp;rft.aulast=Bain&amp;rft.btitle=Statement+from+Raymone+Bain+to+all+fans+and+fanclubs&amp;rft.date=October+31%2C+2006&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.mjtmc.com%2Fnews%2Fdetails.aspx%3Flang%3DEN%26module%3DAHAA%26baseModule%3DAHAA%26news_id%3D1062%26page%3D1&amp;rft.pub=Mjtmc.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-427">

                    <li>
                     <b>
                      <img alt="Wikipedia book" data-file-height="185" data-file-width="180" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/89/Symbol_book_class2.svg/16px-Symbol_book_class2.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/89/Symbol_book_class2.svg/23px-Symbol_book_class2.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/89/Symbol_book_class2.svg/31px-Symbol_book_class2.svg.png 2x" title="Wikipedia book" width="16"/>
                      <a href="/wiki/Book:The_Jackson_5" title="Book:The Jackson 5">
                       Book
                      </a>
                     </b>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <b>
                      <img alt="Category" data-file-height="31" data-file-width="36" height="14" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/48/Folder_Hexagonal_Icon.svg/16px-Folder_Hexagonal_Icon.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/48/Folder_Hexagonal_Icon.svg/24px-Folder_Hexagonal_Icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/4/48/Folder_Hexagonal_Icon.svg/32px-Folder_Hexagonal_Icon.svg.png 2x" title="Category" width="16"/>
                      <a href="/wiki/Category:The_Jackson_5" title="Category:The Jackson 5">
                       Category
                      </a>
                     </b>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <b>
                      <img alt="Portal" data-file-height="28" data-file-width="32" height="14" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/f/fd/Portal-puzzle.svg/16px-Portal-puzzle.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/f/fd/Portal-puzzle.svg/24px-Portal-puzzle.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/f/fd/Portal-puzzle.svg/32px-Portal-puzzle.svg.png 2x" title="Portal" width="16"/>
                      <a href="/wiki/Portal:The_Jackson_Family" title="Portal:The Jackson Family">

                      </a>

       <td style="padding:2px">
        <table class="nowraplinks hlist navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit">
         <tr>
          <th class="navbox-group" scope="row">
           <a href="/wiki/Help:Authority_control" title="Help:Authority control">
            Authority control
           </a>
          </th>
          <td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" style="text-align:left;border-left-width:2px;border-left-style:solid;width:100%;padding:0px">
           <div style="padding:0em 0.25em">
            <ul>
             <li>
              <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/identities/lccn-n83-133203" rel="nofollow">
               WorldCat
              </a>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="/wiki/Virtual_International_Authority_File" title="Virtual International Authority File">
               VIAF
              </a>
              :
              <span class="uid">
               <a class="external text" href="https://viaf.org/viaf/27092134" rel="nofollow">
                27092134
               </a>
              </span>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="/wiki/Library_of_Congress_Control_Number" title="Library of Congress Control Number">
               LCCN
              </a>
              :
              <span class="uid">
               <a class="external text" href="http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/n83133203" rel="nofollow">
                n83133203
               </a>
              </span>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Name_Identifier" title="International Standard Name Identifier">
               ISNI
              </a>
              :
              <span class="uid">
               <a class="external text" href="http://isni-url.oclc.nl/isni/000000011023081X" rel="nofollow">
                0000 0001 1023 081X
               </a>
              </span>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="/wiki/Integrated_Authority_File" title="Integrated Authority File">
               GND
              </a>
              :
              <span class="uid">
               <a class="external text" href="http://d-nb.info/gnd/118711083" rel="nofollow">
                118711083
               </a>
              </span>
             </li>
             <li>
              <a href="/wiki/Biblioth%C3%A8que_nationale_de_France" title="Bibliothque nationale de France">
               BNF
              </a>
              :
              <span class="uid">
